section.p: If there is a tick in the box, immediately. If not, put a tick there now, and read on.
The pavilion is a new addition to the bazaar. Inside, you find a woman with a starburst of silvery spiky hair, and mad staring eyes.
'Welcome,' she says. 'I am a priestess of The Oracle in Atticala, and I have been expecting you. A reading of your future will cost 250 Shards.'
